name: Stairway
description:
Stairway is a digital personal tutor for STEM subjects.

We are on a mission to enable anyone to have access to effective and enjoyable education.

Stairway was founded by recent students, who are extremely focused on creating a great product to address the specific challenges faced by students today, through a combination of a great product and content.

team.name: Oliver Hunt
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder at Stairway. Fixing STEM education by building a learning experience students love.

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.description:
Stairway is a digital personal tutor for STEM subjects ðŸŽ“

We are on a mission to enable anyone to have access to effective and enjoyable education.ðŸ“ˆ

Stairway was founded by recent students, who are extremely focused on creating a great product to address the specific challenges faced by students today, through a combination of a great product and content ðŸ’»

We are looking for a Full Stack Engineer to help us scale our existing web application to students around the world!

You'll be a valued member of the Engineering team, with a large amount of input into ideating and planning new features, along with the technical infrastructure to support a fast-growing consumer product ðŸŽ“

**Requirements**

- Experience with Python, Flask and React.js (at least two of three)
- Experience working with NoSQL databases
- Excellent communication and ability to work as part of a team
- Experience working alongside a design team to implement design specifications using HTML, SCSS and React.js
- Experience writing tests, in frameworks such as PyTest, Selenium and Enzyme

**Benefits**

- Stock Option Plan
- Training and Development Budget
- 25 days holiday per year
- Calm.com subscription
- Office Library + Knowledge Sharing
- Pension Plan
